name: Apocriptic 0700
description: [RARE] He is a guinea pig for making biological weapons. But the lab exploded, causing the brain-sucking machine to absorb the fire element and burn all of his organs to death. After a while, his body that had been reduced to ashes fused together again, his organs recovered and his skin turned into embers. Now he comes back to life as the fire and burns everything he sees
